data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText: refl

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c hc,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hc,
refl

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c hc,
rw add_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw succ_add,
rw add_succ,
rw hc,
refl

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction n,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw n_ih,
refl

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw succ_add,
rw hd,
refl

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with b hb,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hb,
rw add_zero,
refl

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with b hb,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hb,
refl

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c hc,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hc,
rw add_assoc,
refl

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw mul_add,
refl

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c hc,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hc,
rw add_right_comm,
refl

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction t with c hc,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hc,
simp

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c hc,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw hc,
refl

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
rw hd,
rw mul_add,
rw add_comm,
rw mul_comm,
rw add_comm,
refl

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_zero,
refl

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_zero,
refl

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_zero,
rw one_mul,
refl

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with n hn,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw hn,
rw mul_one,
refl

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with o ho,
rw pow_zero,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_one,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw ho,
rw mul_assoc,
refl

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with o ho,
rw pow_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_one,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw ho,
simp

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with o ho,
rw mul_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw ho,
rw pow_add,
refl

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
repeat {rw pow_zero},
repeat {rw one_mul},
rw add_mul,
rw mul_comm,
rw add_mul,
rw succ_mul,
rw succ_mul,
rw zero_mul,
rw zero_add,
rw add_mul,rw mul_add,
simp

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p)

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact n

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t)

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t)

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
have j := h(p),
apply (f p),
exact j

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intros m n p,
have q := m(p),
have f := n(q),
exact f

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
have q := f(p),
apply h,
exact q

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
exact q

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros n o p,
apply (n p),
have q := o(p),
exact q

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros n o p,
apply o,
apply n,
exact p

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
intros n o p,
apply o, 
apply n,
exact p

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact p,
exact q

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intros h j,
cases h with p q,
cases j with q r,
split,
exact p,
exact r

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros a b,
cases a with c d,
cases b with e f,
split,
intro p,
apply e,
apply c,
exact p,
intros r,
apply d,
apply f,
exact r

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros a b,
cases a with c d,
cases b with e f,
split,
intro p,
apply e,
apply c,
exact p,
intros r,
apply d,
apply f,
exact r

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro q,
right,
exact q

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
right,
exact p,
left,
exact q

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
cases h with f g,
cases g,
left,
split,
exact f,
exact g,
right,
split,
exact f,
exact g,
intro h,
split,
cases h with f g,
cases f with p q,
exact p,
cases g with p r,
exact p,
cases h with a b,
cases a with p q,
left,
exact q,
cases b with p r,
right,
exact r

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p np,
have boom := np(p),
exfalso,
exact boom

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
intros h r,
by_cases p : P, 
by_cases q : Q,
exact q,
have np := h(q),
have boom := np(p),
exfalso,
exact boom,
exfalso,
have boom := p(r),
exact boom

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have p := succ_inj(hs),
exact p

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have p := succ_inj(succ_inj(h)),
exact p

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
rw p,
refl

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro a,
have p := succ_inj(a),
exact p,
intro a,
rw a,
refl

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction t,
rw add_zero at h,
rw add_zero at h,
rw h,
refl,
rw add_succ at h,
rw add_succ at h,
have p := succ_inj(h),
have r := t_ih(p),
exact r

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw add_comm at h,
rw add_comm(t) at h,
have p := add_right_cancel a t b,
have r := p(h),
exact r

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro p,
have q := add_right_cancel a t b,
exact q(p),
intro p,
rw p,
refl

data.lean: lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
induction a,
rw zero_add at p,
exact p,
rw succ_add at p,
have q :=  succ_inj(p),
exact a_ih(q)

data.lean: theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
have r := zero_ne_succ a,
symmetry,
exact r

data.lean: lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with d,
refl,
rw add_succ at H,
have p := succ_ne_zero (a+d),
exfalso,
exact p(H)

data.lean: lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases a,
intro p,
refl,
intro q,
rw succ_add at q,
have r := zero_ne_succ (a+b),
symmetry at r,
exfalso,
exact r(q)

data.lean: theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl

data.lean: lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
induction n with o ho,
have q := zero_ne_succ(0),
exact q(p),
have g := succ_eq_succ_iff (o) (succ(o)),
cases g with a b,
have r := a(p),
exact ho(r)

data.lean: theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
intro r,
cases b with d,
rw mul_zero at r,
exact q(r),
rw mul_succ at r,
cases a,
rw zero_mul at r,
rw zero_add at r,
exact p(r),
rw add_succ at r,
have g := zero_ne_succ(succ a * d + a),
symmetry at g,
exact g(r)

data.lean:
theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases a,
left,
rw zero_mul at h,
exact h,
cases b,
right,
rw mul_zero at h,
exact h,
rw mul_succ at h,
rw add_succ at h,
exfalso,
 have r := zero_ne_succ(succ a * b + a),
 symmetry at r,
 exact r(h)

data.lean: theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro p,
have r := eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b,
exact r(p),
intro q,
cases q,
rw q,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw q,
rw mul_zero,
refl

data.lean: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd generalizing b,
rw mul_zero,
intro p,
have r := eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b p,
cases r,
exfalso,
exact ha r,
exact r,
induction b with g hg,
rw mul_zero,
intro p,
symmetry at p,
have r := eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a (succ d) p,
cases r,
exfalso,
exact ha r,
symmetry,
exact r,
have s := hd g,
intro r,
rw mul_succ at r,
rw mul_succ at r,
have t := add_right_cancel (a*g) a (a*d) r,
have x := succ_eq_succ_of_eq (s t),
exact x,

data.lean: lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use 1,
rw add_comm

data.lean: lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use 0,
rw add_zero,
refl

data.lean: theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw le_iff_exists_add at h,
cases h with c hc,
rw hc,
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use (succ c),
rw add_succ,
refl

data.lean: lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use a,
rw zero_add,
refl

data.lean: theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add at hab,
cases hab with i hi,
rw le_iff_exists_add at hbc,
cases hbc with j hj,
rw hi at hj,
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use i+j,
simp at hj,
exact hj

data.lean: theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with i hi,
cases hba with j hj,
rw hj at hi,
rw add_assoc at hi,
symmetry at hi,
have h := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self hi,
have p := add_right_eq_zero h,
rw p at hj,
rw add_zero at hj,
exact hj

data.lean: lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases h with i h,
symmetry at h,
have hi := add_right_eq_zero h,
exact hi

data.lean: lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
data.editorText:
cases h with i hi,
have p := le_iff_exists_add (succ a) (succ b),
cases p,
apply p_mpr,
use i,
rw hi,
rw succ_add,
refl

data.lean: theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
data.editorText: sorry,

data.lean: lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
data.editorText:
use 1,
exact succ_eq_add_one a,

data.lean: theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
cases p with d hd,
intro t,
use d,
rw hd,
simp,

data.lean: theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
cases p with d hd,
rw succ_add at hd,
use d,
have r := succ_eq_succ_iff b (a+d),
cases r with l r,
apply l,
exact hd,

data.lean: theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
cases p with q hq,
have r := succ_eq_add_one a,
rw r at hq,
rw add_assoc at hq,
symmetry at hq,
have u := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self hq,
rw add_comm at u,
have v := succ_eq_add_one q,
rw u at v,
exact succ_ne_zero q v,

data.lean:
theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
data.editorText:
cases h with d hd,
use d,
rw hd,
simp,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText: sorry,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
split,
have q := le_succ_self a,
have r:= le_trans a (succ a) b q p,
exact r,
intro q,
have r := le_trans (succ a) b a p q,
exact not_succ_le_self a r,

data.lean: lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact lt_aux_one a b,
exact lt_aux_two a b,
